concept.description: Abstract concept that returns all types labeled with "JPA" and "Entity".
Abstract concept that returns all types labeled with "JPA" and "Embeddable".
Abstract concept that returns all fields or methods labeled with "JPA" and "Embedded".
Abstract concept that returns all fields or methods labeled with "JPA" and "EmbeddedId".
Abstract concept that returns the name and the query of a node labeled with "JPA" and "NamedQuery" defined by a node labeled with "JPA" and "Entity".
concept.cypher: MATCH (entity:JPA:Entity)-[:DEFINES]->(n:JPA:NamedQuery) RETURN entity as Entity, n.name as Name, n.query as Query

constraint.description: The validation mode of all persistence units must be explicitly specified and either set to CALLBACK or NONE.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (pu:PersistenceUnit) WHERE pu.validationMode IS NULL OR NOT ( pu.validationMode='CALLBACK' OR pu.validationMode='NONE' ) RETURN pu AS PersistenceUnit
